#summary Howto get started with grailsMDA.

= Get started =

1.) Download the latest version of *grailsMDA.jar* from http://code.google.com/p/grailsmda/downloads/list

2.) Download the latest version of *build.xml* from http://code.google.com/p/grailsmda/downloads/list

3.) Modify the *genpath*, *modelpath* and *grailsMDA* properties in the *build.xml*

4.) Run the "clean-build" task

5.) Look into your *genpath* for generated grails domain classes
